Commentary.ab: On the number of aṣ̌əm vohū and yaϑā ahū vairiiō, vid. Nērang and VrS0.13 Rit. Quot.

Nerangs.ab: yaϑā ahū vairiiō 4 guftan pad har š́iiaōϑənanąm rāspīg ēsm ud bōy tāg-ē ō ī ātaxš nihišn agar yazišn ī gāhānbār bēd har ēk dah abāyēd guftan ō ī pāy ēstēnišn

"He should recite four yaϑā ahū vairiiō At each š́iiaōϑənanąm, the rāspīg has to put a piece of ēsm and bōy in the fire. If it is the liturgy of a gāhānbār, he must recite each stanza ten times. He has to be standing."
yaϑā ahū vairiiō čahār guftan pad har š́iiaōϑənanąm rāspīg ēsm ud bōy tāg-ē ō ī ātaxš nihišn agar yazišn ī gāhānbār bēd aṣ̌əm vohū dah abāyēd guftan yaϑā ahū vairiiō dah guftan ō ī pāy ēstēnišn

"He should recite four yaϑā ahū vairiiō At each š́iiaōϑənanąm, the rāspīg has to put a piece of ēsm and bōy in the fire. If it is the liturgy of a gāhānbār, he must recite ten aṣ̌əm vohū and ten yaθā ahū vairiiō. He has to be standing."
yaϑā ahū vairiiō harw ēk dah guftan ēn gyāg sāzišn ud zōhr hamāg bē nigerišn ud ēsm ud bōy ō ī ātaxš dahišn
"He should recite the yaϑā ahū vairiiō, each ten times. At this moment, he has to inspect all the implements and the zōhr and (the rāspīg) has to give a piece of ēsm and bōy to the fire."
